farrisdata 0.0.5.900

Sashimi plot files data.frame for Farris data

Source: R/farrisdata.r
farris_sashimi_files_df.Rd

Sashimi plot files data.frame for Farris data

farris_sashimi_files_df

Format

data.frame suitable for use with splicejam::prepareSashimi() for the filesDF argument.

Examples

#farris_sashimi_files_df
base_url <- "https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/";
factor1 <- c("CA1", "CA2", "CA3", "DG");
factor2 <- c("CB", "DE");
junc_suffix <- ".STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed";
junc_urls <- paste0(base_url,
   rep(factor1, each=2),
   "_",
   rep(factor2, 4),
   junc_suffix);
junc_sample_id <- paste(rep(factor1, each=2),
   rep(factor2, 4),
   sep="_");
junc_df <- data.frame(sample_id=junc_sample_id,
   url=junc_urls,
   type="junction");
if (suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(knitr))) {
   knitr::kable(junc_df)
} else {
   junc_df;
}
#> 
#> 
#> |sample_id |url                                                                                       |type     |
#> |:---------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------|
#> |CA1_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA1_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |CA1_DE    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA1_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |CA2_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA2_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |CA2_DE    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA2_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |CA3_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA3_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |CA3_DE    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA3_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed |junction |
#> |DG_CB     |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/DG_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed  |junction |
#> |DG_DE     |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/DG_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed  |junction |

bw_factor1 <- c(factor1);
bw_factor2 <- c(factor2);
bw_pre1 <- c("NS50211", "NS50218", "NS50217", "NS50266", "NS50266");
bw_pre2 <- c("492", "496", "502", "492", "502");
bw_strand <- c("pos", "neg");
bw_mid <- rep(c("_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.",
   "-X.STAR_mm10."),
   c(24,16));
bw_suffix <- ".bw";
bw_urls <- paste0(
   rep(bw_pre1, each=8),
   rep(rep(bw_factor1, each=2), 5),
   rep(rep(bw_factor2, 4), 5),
   rep(bw_pre2, each=8),
   bw_mid,
   bw_strand,
   bw_suffix
);
# remove samples for which four replicates were not required
bw_urls <- gsub("^NS50266.*(CA1|CA3|496).*", NA, bw_urls);
# quick view of replicates available
if (suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(knitr))) {
   knitr::kable(as.data.frame(matrix(bw_urls, ncol=5)))
} else {
   as.data.frame(matrix(bw_urls, ncol=5));
}
#> 
#> 
#> |V1                                                        |V2                                                        |V3                                                        |V4                                 |V5                                 |
#> |:---------------------------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------|:----------------------------------|
#> |NS50211CA1CB492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50218CA1CB496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50217CA1CB502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NA                                 |NA                                 |
#> |NS50211CA1DE492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50218CA1DE496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50217CA1DE502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NA                                 |NA                                 |
#> |NS50211CA2CB492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50218CA2CB496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50217CA2CB502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50266CA2CB492-X.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50266CA2CB502-X.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |
#> |NS50211CA2DE492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50218CA2DE496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50217CA2DE502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50266CA2DE492-X.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50266CA2DE502-X.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |
#> |NS50211CA3CB492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50218CA3CB496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NS50217CA3CB502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw |NA                                 |NA                                 |
#> |NS50211CA3DE492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50218CA3DE496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NS50217CA3DE502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw |NA                                 |NA                                 |
#> |NS50211DGCB492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw  |NS50218DGCB496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw  |NS50217DGCB502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.pos.bw  |NS50266DGCB492-X.STAR_mm10.pos.bw  |NS50266DGCB502-X.STAR_mm10.pos.bw  |
#> |NS50211DGDE492_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw  |NS50218DGDE496_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw  |NS50217DGDE502_1.sickle.merged.cutadapt.STAR_mm10.neg.bw  |NS50266DGDE492-X.STAR_mm10.neg.bw  |NS50266DGDE502-X.STAR_mm10.neg.bw  |

# remove NA entries
bw_url <- rmNA(bw_urls);
bw_sample_id <- gsub("^.*(CA[123]|DG)(CB|DE).*", "\\1_\\2",
   bw_url);
bw_df <- data.frame(
   url=paste0(base_url, bw_url),
   sample_id=bw_sample_id,
   type="bw");
bw_df <- bw_df[do.call(order, bw_df[,c(2,1,3)]),];

farris_sashimi_files_df <- rbind(
   junc_df,
   bw_df);
farris_sashimi_files_df$scale_factor <- 1;
farris_sashimi_files_df$CellType <- factor(
   gsub("_.+", "",
      farris_sashimi_files_df$sample_id),
   levels=factor1);
farris_sashimi_files_df$Compartment <- factor(
   gsub("^.+_", "",
      farris_sashimi_files_df$sample_id),
   levels=factor2);
if (suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(knitr))) {
   knitr::kable(farris_sashimi_files_df)
} else {
   farris_sashimi_files_df;
}
#> 
#> 
#> |    |sample_id |url                                                                                                          |type     | scale_factor|CellType |Compartment |
#> |:---|:---------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------|------------:|:--------|:-----------|
#> |1   |CA1_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA1_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed                    |junction |            1|CA1      |CB          |
#> |2   |CA1_DE    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA1_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed                    |junction |            1|CA1      |DE          |
#> |3   |CA2_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA2_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed                    |junction |            1|CA2      |CB          |
#> |4   |CA2_DE    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA2_DE.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed                    |junction |            1|CA2      |DE          |
#> |5   |CA3_CB    |https://orio.niehs.nih.gov/ucscview/farrisHub/mm10/CA3_CB.STAR_mm10.combinedJunctions.bed                    |junction |            1|CA3      |CB          |

table(farris_sashimi_files_df[,c("CellType", "Compartment", "type")]);
#> , , type = junction
#> 
#>         Compartment
#> CellType CB DE
#>      CA1  1  1
#>      CA2  1  1
#>      CA3  1  1
#>      DG   1  1
#> 
#> , , type = bw
#> 
#>         Compartment
#> CellType CB DE
#>      CA1  3  3
#>      CA2  5  5
#>      CA3  3  3
#>      DG   5  5
#>
